ygData.subject: Re: Permafrost
ygData.msgSnippet: I too have explored quite a bit of Perma, but i have not ran into any traps or pits (Unlike my first exploratiion of Najena)..Well i was sucked up into a gate
ygData.messageBody:
I too have explored quite a bit of Perma, but i have
not ran into any traps or pits (Unlike my first
exploratiion of Najena)..Well i was sucked up into a
gate once and couldn't get out, but that's a different
story...I would appreciate any info on this zone as
well....

Xraxex D'Tosorv
Karana

--- James Wofford <James.Wofford@...> wrote:
> From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
>
> Can anyone provide any information concerning this
> place. I spent a few
> hours there last night and had a very very good
> time. I am concerned about
> pitfalls/traps and things like that. I have
> explored a good portion of the
> upper floor around where the ice goblin is in the
> block of ice. Beyond
> that, I know nothing of it. If you have any
> information (no spoilers)
> concerning the existance of pitfalls/traps and such,
> please let me know.
> Would hate to get a corpse stuck somewhere that I
> can not get to.
>
> ~Daks/Dyvim
>
